ComicInfo.Title: Gluehead and his Pals; On the Set with Film Queen Baby Bliss; Phelch Phunnies; They'll do it every time; Morning in Mallorca; The Felching Vampires Meet the Holy Virgin Mary; The Nectar of Satan
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gluehead and his Pals: Gluehead is drinking and having sex with his pals under the Brooklyn Bridge, while Veronica is felching at her girlfriend's.
On the Set with Film Queen Baby Bliss: A climps on the set with the porn film queen.
Phelch Phunnies: An unclean couple phelches each other away.
They'll do it every time: A police arrests a prostitute.
Morning in Mallorca: The pleasures of the rich are bought with the tears of the poor. "Felch!"
The Felching Vampires Meet the Holy Virgin Mary: The Felching Vampires rape and suck the blood of young girls. They do the same for the Holy Virgin Mary, which produces felching vampire Christ child. And what was the end for Jesus?
The Nectar of Satan: The Macheesmoe, The He-She and Count Fifi kidnap Police Chief's daughter and Tutankhamun's tablet. In the end there will be a fight for The Nectar of Satan, a clump of jizz.
